projects.name: STUDYNOTION: ED-TECH PLATFORM
projects.description: About Study-Notion is a fully functional ed-tech platform designed to revolutionize the way we learn and teach. Enhance learning with an engaging platform and empower educators to connect with global learners. Instructors create multimedia courses; students access and engage with content; users rate and review courses.

projects.name: HEALTHISTA - A MENTAL HEALTH CARE WEBSITE
projects.description: Developed and launched Healthista, a comprehensive mental health care website aimed at empowering individuals' mental wellness. A mechanism to provide different types of Stress relief therapy (Spiritual, Audio, Yoga, Laughing, Reading therapy and many more). Consult psychiatrist /therapist only when necessary.

projects.name: LINKEDIN CLONE
projects.description: Developed a LinkedIn clone using React JS, Redux, and Firebase, implementing features like user profiles, login, sign up and post creation. Visually appealing user interface React, and utilized Firebase for authentication, real-time database.

experiences.description: Developed server-side applications and RESTful APIs using Node.js, leveraging Express.js for efficient routing and middleware handling. Created and executed API tests and automation scripts using Postman, ensuring API functionality, reliability, and performance. Conducted data scraping and extraction tasks using Python, utilizing libraries like BeautifulSoup to gather and analyze web data.

full_output.name: Sushil Verma
achievements_and_awards: Smart India Hackathon23: Successfully participated in a 36-hour hackathon, advancing from the internal round at the College level to becoming a finalist at the Nationals of SIH'23.
IDE Bootcamp: Attended IDE Bootcamp on entrepreneurship by Ministry of Education, gaining insights into business and startup fundamentals.
Open-Source Contributor: Secured 36th rank in GSSOC23 with submission of 63 PR in multiple projects.
Led design initiatives as Design Head at Proximus and E-Cell Society, shaping organizational branding and promotional campaigns.
